title: build: doc/articles/wiki check is flaky
body:
Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

tip

Please provide any additional information below.

I see this from time to time when running something like

GOMAXPROCS=111 ./run.bash --no-rebuild

# ../doc/articles/wiki
rm -f srcextract.bin htmlify.bin get.bin
2013/05/26 06:01:36 Get http://127.0.0.1:46995/edit/Test: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:46995:
connection refused
./test.bash: line 9: kill: (31827) - No such process
